content.p: Assistant Professor, Faculty of Social Sciences Assistant Professor Dr Shi Wei Chu has more than 15 years of experience working with individuals with special educational needs. She holds a PhD in Special Education and Diverse Needs and Masters of Education (Special Education). Her expertise is in special education and diverse needs, focusing on individuals with Neurodevelopmental disabilities Her area of research is on inclusion and supported employment. Her current research includes Universal Design for Learning in the higher education context. telephone: +6 (03) 8725 3717 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8020
